# buildExpression(_:)

**Type Method**

Builds a transfer representation from an expression.

## Declaration

```swift
static func buildExpression<R>(_ content: R) -> R where Item == R.Item, R : TransferRepresentation
```

## Building a transfer representation

- **buildBlock(_:)**: Passes a single transfer representation to the builder unmodified.
- **buildExpression(_:)**: Builds an encodable and decodable transfer representation from an expression.
